website_summaries.verdict: Available in several colors, this ankle boot is cheaper than our top pick and is perfect for cool, dry days.
pros: Boots fit great and sizing chart is accurate
They provide enough warmth for winter days, even if not wearing socks
The interior lining is good at wicking sweat
Quality design ensures the boot will last several seasons without needing to be replaced

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM! And they're REAL!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I bought these. Based on the reviews I had some mixed feelings about ordering these boots. But then I did some of my own research and decided to make the purchase. I LOVE THEM! They fit perfectly and run true to size. Even after wearing them I was still skeptical of whether they were the real deal. So I went to the UGG Australia website and had a live chat with customer service and they assure me they were legitimate.
customer_reviews.author: Kandice Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Live the shoes, dislike the seller
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these boots; however, I was disappointed that when I received these, they were obviously a return from someone else. There was a little bit of dirt on the bottom and much animal hair very noticable on both shoes. Disappointed to pay full price for shoes that were obviously not new.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara D. Roebuck

customer_reviews.title: Ugg Tall Women's Boots
customer_reviews.text: Just Perfect!! I followed the advice of previous reviewers and I am so glad that I did. Order a size smaller than your usual size. Ugg boots are designed to be worn without socks. The Classic boot is wide enough for everyone. I usually wear a wide width in shoes and these accommodate my foot perfectly. They are warm and very well made. I highly recommend them. Spray them with a water protectant before wearing and they will look beautiful for years.
customer_reviews.author: DayDreamer

customer_reviews.title: Holes in Toes of Boot after 1.5 Winter Seasons
customer_reviews.text: These boots are like big cozy slippers. However, I bought them for their lasting quality, as I was frustrated at having to buy a new pair of winter boots every other year. I am barely into my second winter season wearing these boots and they both have holes where my big toes are peeking out! Even my cheapo boots didn't get an actual hole. I am so disappointed. Not sure if these were defects what, but for the price of Uggs, this fast deterioration should not be happening.
customer_reviews.author: Skbrum1

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but really prefer EMUS
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace a pair of ruined chocolate Emus, and while they are very pretty and more streamlined, my Emus are warmer and a bit wider at the top. I don't have large calves (I wear a 30 jean) and have trouble getting the jean to look smooth getting the jean into the boot. I also find my toes getting cold in these much faster than my Emus. It could just be this pair; I have several pair of Uggs and this is my first issue. It's my first pair of talls, though. Needless to say I liked them enough to keep them, I just need some warmer days for my toes. :-)
customer_reviews.author: djNC

customer_reviews.title: Uggs are wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: I love Uggs. So do my girls. They're cozy, comfortable, and warm. They're adorable with the proper attire. They're so durable. If you're looking for disposable boots, these are not ideal. But if you're looking for boots to invest a little $$ in that will stand up to winter weather (use good judgement - they're not that indestructible), you can't go wrong with Uggs classics. I highly - highly - highly recommend purchasing the protectant spray and cleaner. They come in a pre-packaged tin, I believe. Don't wear them until you've protected them. Just follow the directions - they're super easy - you can't go wrong. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Designer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like UGGS for fit and warmth
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like UGGS for fit and warmth. I don't know how they make them, but they are fabulous...right out of the box. This is one product for which I don't waste time looking for a sale. I live in the Chicago suburbs, and take the train to work in the city, then walk 8 blocks to my office. The rest of me may be cold, but my feet are toasty warm when I get there. UGGS are the best! I have ten pairs, and I will buy more!!
customer_reviews.author: CharD

customer_reviews.title: Cheap for a reason!
customer_reviews.text: So I was happy to find Ugg’s cheap, and was happy till I opened the box. No cards were inside. A price tag stapled to the bottom showing they’re price. There were two scuffs one on each boot. One boot fit, the other one cut into my top part of ankle. Convinced my left ankle was fatter then the other foot. Went to the mall tried the same boots on and they fit so nice. Would never buy uggs off amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best boots ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best boots ever! Most comfortable, warmest, durable! I started my search for boots after playing in the Wisconsin snow with my daughter and my feet were frozen. I probably had not played in the snow since I was a kid. I researched these ordered them and now have 2 pair that have lasted 2 years no problems. Be aware order a size smaller! I am usually a 6.5 I ordered a 6 and they work great but my friend order a 9 (she is usually a 8.5 and hers are too big!) I read in the description to order smaller she didn't read that. The cost is worth it the quality is superior to anything out there!
customer_reviews.author: Lola Cava

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These look real from all I have researched, they did not come in an Ugg box, but an Amazon box with writing on the inside saying the were repackaged due to damage to the original box.
customer_reviews.author: KReece

customer_reviews.title: Genuine UGG boots
customer_reviews.text: These genuine UGGs are exactly what you want when looking for the real deal. The price point is the same as this offer no matter where you shop. Arrived quickly and in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: tahill

customer_reviews.title: Ugg boot bx
customer_reviews.text: The boots are great but I did not get the original Ugg box, they were sent in a plain cardboard box. I like storing my shoes and boots in the original boxes so I was disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these boots! I was hesitant to buy a pair of Uggs because I thought they'd be all hype (hello, fad) and no delivery. I was wrong. They were worth every penny. In the winter, I wear them nearly every day. They keep my feet warm (without socks!) and yet, when spring time hit and the weather warmed up, I found I was still able to wear them and my feet stayed sweat free and dry. They hold up beautifully and I love that you can fold them down for a different look. I definitely see more Uggs in my future!
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in service and product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pair of brown tall Ugg boots for my daughter. This is her 3rd pair of Uggs. They were appropriately treated with Ugg brand water repellant as always. She wore them one time in light snow and they got discolored. This has never happened with her other Ugg boots. I sent pictures to the seller immediately after one wearing. They refused to replace or acknowledge if they were genuine product. I paid full market price for them. Very disappointed in service and product. $155.00 plus shipping for poor quality boot from this seller
customer_reviews.author: Mary A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Uggs are Uggs, no mystery about what you're getting. Same exact boots offered at our nice department store but for $50 less!! I personally don't like the Ugg style and wouldn't wear them, so not commenting on the style, but my teen daughter loves them. Good color too, much less likely to look dirty quickly and they go with everything.
customer_reviews.author: JRK

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves her Christmas Ugg's
customer_reviews.text: Product as expected. High quality boot. I purchased for my wife for Christmas. Purchase on Christmas Eve Eve and still received before Christmas. She loves them. We live in Arizona and it doesn't get too cold here, but my my wife and daughter cant wait until it dips below 60 to start wearing their Ugg's. Great boot. Worth the money. She said the following: "Snug at first then they mold your feet". "I love my boots!"
customer_reviews.author: ROB LOZ

customer_reviews.title: Brand Name Bust
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted these to work - thought they'd be great at work on my feet all day. However, for the cost of the boots I feel there should be no discomfort. The rolled finishing band around the ankle dug into my ankle as I stepped forward. I did not feel that part of the boot would ever "stretch out" so back to Amazon the boots had to go. Might be just my feet as there are so many positive reviews. I'm not willing to wear brand names in pain though.
customer_reviews.author: LaBelle  Coeur

customer_reviews.title: Dye comes off
customer_reviews.text: First time my daughter wore these boots she walked through a wet lawn and discovered the brown dye bled onto her white socks and through to her toes!!! The boots never dried back to their natural color, insted, the dark stain stayed - looking like the boots are still wet after days. Don't really know what happened. Amazon Prime was great and accepted the return with no problem. Amazon is an authorized dealer for UGG so I wouldn't think we got a fake. I am now rather concerned about the quality of UGG products - for the price I wouldn't expect what happened...
customer_reviews.author: ThriftyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Shoe size runs about 1 size bigger
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first pair of tall uggs, about 8 years ago i still have them and still wear them, my shoe size is 6-61/2 and purchased them in a size 6, at first they fit just right but with time the boot began to fit loose now their are about one whole size bigger, when i wear them now i have to wear them with a thick sock and sometimes doble sock to get a better fit. Finally decided to purchase my second pair of tall Ugg Boot, this time i made sure to go one size smaller, i purchased a size 5 and fit a fit just fine, i wear them with a thin sock.
customer_reviews.author: SCorona

customer_reviews.title: Always a crowd pleaser
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product 5-stars because I am a huge fan of UGG and its products. I am a 8.5 but always order a size down to prevent buckling in the for portion of the boot. I am also a wide calf girl and these fit like a glove. I like the Sand color because you can easily clean and they are neutral color for all of you outfits. The shearling will preserve your body heat so yes you can wear these 365 days a year. The tall boots are best for fall and winter and the short for spring and summer. These boots are where function meet fashion. Grab a pair or two.
customer_reviews.author: La Negrita

customer_reviews.title: I love UGG boots but
customer_reviews.text: I love their warmth and comfort for winter- I use them especialy for walking my dog. However, they are hard to water-proof and do wear out after a couple of years.I like the classic styles best and have 3 of the different length /color of boots. However, the colors on the website photos are not exact- I would look in a store before buying unless black or some neutral shade.(The grey ones turn purple-streaked when dry-cleaned) They are rather expensive for a casual boot, but I really like the feel and warmth
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: i will say that i had some difficulty first putting them on as I have big feet and these shoes are structured but that is perfectly okay because i hate to see people walking around with those saggy ankle fake Uggs on. The material inside is black and i noticed that it had rubbed off on my feet during the day but I also experience this with new blue jeans so again that was not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Diva94

customer_reviews.title: nature meets science
customer_reviews.text: They're Uggs, Dude...it is a sherling boot, straight forward, with the quality that only money can buy. If you don't understand...the natural wool turned in and still attached to the hide facing out. Ridiculously warm, unbeatable moisture/vapor wicking and dispersement means no sweat even in warm weather. No socks needed. This is wear nature is the perfect scientist and man was a pretty good engineer. There is no substitute for quality...NOT WATERPROOF...but not the point...
customer_reviews.author: MATT

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend spending the extra bucks and purchasing a pair
customer_reviews.text: These are my go-to pair of boots in the Winter and they keep my feet warm and dry while still looking stylish. I definitely recommend spending the extra bucks and purchasing a pair! You will get a lot of wear and tear out of them and they will most certainly be worth your money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again and again!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Love! Love! Them! Best feeling shoe! I wear a 6 normaly but 5 fits perfectly. These are not my first Ugg. Last forever. These didn't cause I fell and shatter my knee and bone all the way up to hip and they had to cut boot off.
customer_reviews.author: Edwina Greene

customer_reviews.title: Like slipping into a warm, cozy bath
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Loved the box it came in with all the cards of it's authenticity. Just in time for the frigid weather. They are snuggly warm and super cozy. Only down side which is a small thing, is that I ordered black and I love to wear them barefoot so I can squeeze my toes in the fur, when I took my feet out, they were stained with a bit of the black dye from the boot. Particularly my heels were stained a bit black. But very little and it rubbed off in the shower. Otherwise, I can't wait to slip into them again.
customer_reviews.author: Nobantu

customer_reviews.title: These boots are therapeutic for sore feet!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 10.5 or 11, but based on reviews, bought these a little smaller in size 10. They are snug, but feel great, especially on bare feet. I do a lot of ballroom dancing and often have sore feet. After long dance practice sessions, these boots cradle my sore soles in luxuriously soft sheepskin. Sometimes, I even wear them in the house like slippers because they are so comfortable. You can look at the knock offs and imitations, but real Uggs are worth every penny. My recommendation is not to compromise.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Van Decker

customer_reviews.title: Ive always Loved Uggs but with my new pair not so much!
customer_reviews.text: These Uggs are not as durable as my previous Ugg boots! The inner liner doesn't come out either like the reviews say. Disappointing because I feel that's why my last Uggs lasted so long. I purchased a pair of new insoles & wore them again for a long period of time before needing to replace them. I also sprayed my new Uggs day 1 to protect the outer & my boots show small spots from light rain... The next time I get Uggs I'm going thru the original Ugg maker. My husband thinks Uggs are overpriced slippers & I disputed that & got this pair because my last pair was so awesome but unfortunately he was right!
customer_reviews.author: Alison M.

customer_reviews.title: Still checking them out
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my granddaughter who received another pair form someone else. There is a slight difference on the bottom of the boots, the inside fur, the way the tags are sewn on the back of heel and inside, the feel of the outside suade, and also the seams. I have heard about fakes so I am checking it out carefully. They both look good but the differences made us stop and think about who is selling fake ones. It's a crime to do so...but I will report it if I find out they are fake. Any tips are more than welcomed.
customer_reviews.author: jennypoo

customer_reviews.title: Uggs - Tall
customer_reviews.text: I'll start out by saying I have two other pairs of these boots - in Black and Chocolate Brown - and both are size 8 with some room to spare. This pair was much smaller. The foot bed was shorter and the calf area was narrower. Also, when comparing the inner lining, this pair felt completely different than my other 2 pairs. They looked great and the packaging all appeared to be legit, but I had to return them for sizing. I purchased them in the same size from a different retailer and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: mikkel42

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Not Fake
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what everyone else is talking about these being fake. They came in the UGG box not bags( you can only get those from the ugg store the bags that is...) and when I looked at the take to determine if the reflexive Suns were there they were !! Very comfortable shoes and for a good price too. I got these from Wayne Roberts footwear through Amazon and the guy website said that Amazon and Robert Wayne both are authorized dealers. Will be buying more in the future😁😁
customer_reviews.author: K. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Uggs are the best
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Ugg Classic. I wanted a new pair to wear for dress since my other pair is 7 years old and has seen some bad weather. Even though Uggs are pricey I love them - when they get dirty I have washed them in the washing machine a few times to get the salt from winter months off or just scrubbed them real good. Before I wore the new pair I sprayed them with a protectant. Definitely looking forward to another 7-10 years with this new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about UGGs that hasn't already been said. Looks wise they are not attractive whatsoever but functionality wise they are the greatest money ever spent. I live in upstate NY where we get a ton of snow and these are all I wear all winter. They have lasted forever as well, save yourself the time and effort of buying knockoffs and just buy uggs the first time, they are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lynn

customer_reviews.title: 100% real UGG Australia
customer_reviews.text: Thank you! For everyone who claims they didn’t receive real UGG’s, not sure why you think that I own 7 pairs of UGG’s and these are just as real as the ones I purchased directly from UGG Australia. I attached a picture to prove it. I would definitely buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Storm Cloud

customer_reviews.title: Comforatable, fit well, Momma likes them. I'm not in the dog house.
customer_reviews.text: We lost our home and everything in our lives in the 2016 Erskine fire. The Misses had a pair of these I had bought her for Christmas back in 2014. She finally got her new pair. If Momma's happy, everybody's happy. :o)
customer_reviews.author: John Campbell

customer_reviews.title: So warm and Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these boots! They fit perfectly. My feet are always so cold and since I got these boots I have had some toasty toes! I was able to sit at my daughter's soccer game when it was only 11 degrees out and my feet weren't cold at all! You have to wear them with skinny jeans or leggings. I have a pair of jeans that are straight, but not skinny and I have problems wearing these boots with those jeans. I love the color. I think it goes with just about everything.
customer_reviews.author: J Capper

customer_reviews.title: Love my boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love Ugg Boots. I have been wearing this style and brand since 1997 and the quality has not changed. The price has changed dramatically, but when Hollywood decided they like something then I guess we all get stuck paying the higher prices. I live in Wisconsin and my boots usually last about three years, which isn't as great as my Sorels, but they are meant to be worn differently than Sorels. They are expensive but worth it if you have cold feet, because these keep you toasty warm. My shoe size is 8-1/2 and I wear an 8 in Uggs, which is a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: jsdoyle1

customer_reviews.title: Great UGGS!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 6.5 and I ordered a 6. They fit perfectly. These are the real deal. Authentic UGGS. I was a little worried by other reviews which stated they are fake. These were not fake. Very happy with my purchase. Price was amazing. Love Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: JLaC

customer_reviews.title: but they eventually stretch out and fit perfect. My first pair of Ugg's I own I ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. I am normally a size 8 in women's but I purchased a size 7. They of course feel a little snug at first, but they eventually stretch out and fit perfect. My first pair of Ugg's I own I purchased in a size 8, they eventually stretched out and now they are a tad to big causing me to trip ever so often. Definitely, recommend going down a size.
customer_reviews.author: Duribe

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I've been buying them for years as they're the warmest, most comfortable shoe/boot I've ever worn. I've learned to buy one size smaller than I normally wear because with a little wear they stretch out and then are too large. I find they hold up well too. The only thing I would warn about is that they can be slippery in wet weather.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Definitely FAKE
customer_reviews.text: Yes, these are fakes. They did not even bother to put them in an UGG Box!!!! The tag inside looks nothing like the other UGGs that I own, there was no certificate of authenticity in the box, the wool inside does not feel anything like actual UGGs. Buyer Beware! Thankfully these were Prime!
customer_reviews.author: L Reed

customer_reviews.title: I love UGGS and this is my second pair
customer_reviews.text: I love UGGS and this is my second pair...but this pair (gray) is tight around the top of the boot and is a little uncomfortable...but my first pair (chestnut) fitted great right around the top...I'm hoping after a couple of times wearing them they'll stretch out some...I would have given it 5 stars if it haven't been for this.
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: Too tight in calf
customer_reviews.text: Cannot believe some of the reviews on these boots concerning the fit. I have been wearing Uggs for years and loved the traditional fit. However, these boots were so tight around the calf that it was actually painful. Must be new fit for this style of Uggs. Was so looking forward to wearing these in cold weather. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Bully Brock

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Boots
customer_reviews.text: My wife tried on these boots in a different color in a mall store. She said they were warm, comfortable, like walking on air, but she wanted the chestnut color, which they didn't have. I ordered these boots for the color, but had to return them because they seemed to be about a half-size small compared to what she tried on in the store. That could be due to thicker socks or some other factor totally unrelated to the boot. I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Other than that they're great. They have the authentication tags on the inside ...
customer_reviews.text: Boots arrived quickly but one has two small stains on it. Not very noticeable, but not really what you want from something new. Other than that they're great. They have the authentication tags on the inside so they do seem to be real. Comfy, of course. If you haven't purchased uggs before make sure you order a size down from what you normally wear. They stretch to your feet and if they're your normal size they'll stretch and end up too big.
customer_reviews.author: reina

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE these Ugg's!!
customer_reviews.text: Like a lot of reviews say....they run a size large so order one size down UNLESS you wear thick socks. My Ugg's arrived 2 days ago and I don't like taking them off my feet lol. Seriously, very comfortable! I don't wear socks with them, I tried but just more comfortable without and I'm usually not the type go sockless EVER. I did order the Ugg care kit to make sure they last! You can't go wrong with these. They're cute folded down or left up.
customer_reviews.author: S. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Needless to say, I love them but they are quite snug when you first put them on. I normally wear a 8.5, bought these in a 9 and they took some getting used to. What I love is that they fit my thin calves. Still trying to decide if I'll wear with or without socks... Manufacturer say wear without but...
customer_reviews.author: Doesn't Matter

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected...
customer_reviews.text: These seemed like low quality boots. The seams down the leg weren't straight. I put them on and they were much shorter and so much tighter on my leg than expected. The size on my foot was fine, but I would never have been able to wear them with pants or anything. I've owned another pair just like this except bought in store, and these were about 2-3 inches shorter on my leg than the others were.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Two different boots, not cool
customer_reviews.text: One boot smaller than the other, two different colors, stitching different, obviously two different boots. And a gift receipt was in the box as well.
customer_reviews.author: Melbear88

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product-UGG Boots
customer_reviews.text: Christmas shopping made easy at Amazon.com. Ordered these UGG Australia Women's Classic Tall Chestnut Boots for our 12 year old granddaughter. Once she had opened the wrapped box with the boots inside, she had them on her feet in no time at all. They are top quality boots and with the cleaner keeps the boots looking new. We could not find this type of UGG Boots anywhere in our local stores. Again, Amazon.com solved a very big problem.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Classic tall are much shorter now a days but the same classic price.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are called "classic tall" however they are not "classic tall" at all, not like my other pair and I can't seem to purchase "a real classic regular tall" they are much shorter now for the same price. So yes I am very disappointed about that. On the other hand they are classically comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ka Tillson, NY

customer_reviews.title: Best present for mothers
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my mom who totally went Gaga over them. She states that they're the best boots she's ever worn and that's saying something since women are shoe/boot connoisseurs. Also saved a couple of bucks because Amazon rocks like that.
customer_reviews.author: HandyDandy

customer_reviews.title: I purchased these boots to replace a pair of similar ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots to replace a pair of similar boots I had gotten her at Costco for $39.00, several years ago and had worn out....Low and behold, the Uggs were identical to the Costco boots...interesting...every detail was identical. However, the quality is first rate and Amazon, as usual, was extremely fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ugg is no longer the quality they once were. ...
customer_reviews.text: Ugg is no longer the quality they once were. I have a 16 year old pair that look brand new. These new ones are junk.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Avery

customer_reviews.title: Uggs
customer_reviews.text: The Ugg boot is a warm and cozy boot. However it would be nice to have a little more arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Clintman45

customer_reviews.title: Don't Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots as a gift. They are not authentic UGGs. You can clearly tell by the synthetic material inside the boots and the hologram on the label. Review the UGGS website on purchasing authentic boots before keeping these boots. I have no issue buying imitation boots if I know they aren't real, but these are being sold as the real UGGS and clearly they are not.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian L

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife for Christmas. As this is her second pair of Uggs we pretty much knew what we were getting into. Quality and comfort are top notch, no complaints whatsoever. The only issue is that if you live in a warm climate (we're in Dallas), you've got a limited timeframe in which you can wear them. They can and do keep your fee really warm such that if it's much warmer than 40 degrees, forget wearing them as they're too warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as promised
customer_reviews.text: The UGG's arrived in perfect condition. The box and wrapping were just like buying them from a retail store. The only thing I have to say is that you should shop around and keep an eye out for sales (especially from UGG's directly). I paid what one would normally pay in a retail store but soon after, I noticed that UGG was having a sale and could have saved nearly 40%! Oh well...I am not disappointed in the product as it is as it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, they're ugly. But they're comfortable to wear on cold days, which is why I wear them. They're not cheap in price, but they do last quite a while, so for me it makes more financial sense to buy a pair that lasts versus buying a new pair or pairs of boots that don't and I may or may not like as much. The black dye does "leak" onto socks, so keep that in mind when buying the black boots.
customer_reviews.author: MooGooGaiBoo

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! Most comfortable ones I own. Great price and product. I normally wear a 5.5 or 6, but my best friend old me to order a size down, I ordered a size 5 and the fit it perfect. Going for a different color so I will be purchasing another pair!
customer_reviews.author: royalrebel

customer_reviews.title: Uggs forever for me
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Uggs Classic tall boots. I have been wearing them for years and i am never disappointed. The feel and fit of these skins on my feet feel as if they were made just for my size 7s. Perfect each time and Amazon delivers the boots right to my hands. No waiting in line and no internet searching for a location near me that has what I am looking for. Perfect fit every time!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Boots in poor condition from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Condition of boots was aweful. We ordered two pair. One for each of our grand daughters. The other pair was great, but this pair must have been a return, or poorly handled. We were on a short time frame so we kept them, but this is one of the worst deals we received from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My order came fast! The packaging was flawless My daughter love them just perfect!! I wish I could've gotten them a half size down from what she normally wears because as weeks went on they stretched a lot but over all she really loves them. I will be ordering me a pair next
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Love
customer_reviews.text: I always get a smaller size just because these boots end up stretching out. Plus I like the boots snugged. Over all love these! By the way, I notice that these uggs boots are manufacture in China where's my other uggs boots that I own are manufacture in Australia. Not that these aren't good quality boots but I rather get the original UGGS.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle N.

customer_reviews.title: Dont' take these off in public.
customer_reviews.text: These run just a little small, but will stretch a little also. I was a little disappointed when I took them off and my feet and socks were BLACK! I did not expect something this expensive to bleed through. I wish I had known that ahead of time, it is very disappointing. They are very comfortable, I am just embarrassed when I take them off.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable/Warm Long Boots
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots because I wanted another pair of Uggs. These boots are very comfortable and I wear them without socks and the boots keep my feet very warm. They arrived on the expected date.
customer_reviews.author: Lenci

customer_reviews.title: UGG-licious
customer_reviews.text: As always, love the UGG Classic Tall.....a little tight at first as I have a high arch and am a half size (always go down in UGG!). But, if you are an UGG lover, then you understand, it is what it is. I wear mine all year....yes, people make fun of me, but I find that the genuine shearling keeps my feet from sweating in the summer and here in New England, even summer mornings can be a little chilly. This is my 4th, 5th, 6th pair....I don't even remember anymore.....
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Carlone

customer_reviews.title: Ugg will always be a good brand, only this time I was left to ...
customer_reviews.text: Ugg will always be a good brand, only this time I was left to duty, they are thinner than others that I bought and therefore I was a little big, I think they have lowered the quality!
customer_reviews.author: IRM

customer_reviews.title: I doubt the shoes would be good support because they're all furry inside
customer_reviews.text: I heard that Uggs fit large, I'm a size 10 usually and bought a 9 and they fit perfectly. I have very high arches, I doubt the shoes would be good support because they're all furry inside, so I wear inserts. I do have wide calves, about 15.5" around, and they're a little tight, but I can roll them down if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Tall Uggs
customer_reviews.text: Love the Uggs! Ordered one size down as reviews stated. Wear size10 shoe, ordered 9 ugg and fit perfectly. Room to wiggle toes and are wonderfully warm. Sprayed with waterproof several times. I have not worn them in the rain yet. Too nervous, but a few more sprays and I will give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: The description is wrong! I did NOT receive sheepskin ...
customer_reviews.text: The description is wrong! I did NOT receive sheepskin uggs - I received UGGPURE wool uggs. Totally different and cheaper product!!
customer_reviews.author: lilysmom

customer_reviews.title: UGGs are Great!
customer_reviews.text: My boots arrived promptly. They were packed very nicely and snugly in their huge box. They are warm, fit well and are very comfortable. I am going to enjoy them when the weather cools down. I could not find black boots in a size 11, without a high heel. Anywhere. I am so pleased to have these - they will work well with skirts and leggings.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Maeder

customer_reviews.title: It was really tight at first but it stretched out and now fits me PERFECT. I wear them all the time
customer_reviews.text: Be sure when you purchase this product that the individual seller you are buying from is authorized to sell UGG. That way you know it is authentic. I bought one size smaller than I usually wear (i.e. I'm usually 8-8.5 and bought sz. 7). It was really tight at first but it stretched out and now fits me PERFECT. I wear them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Richard and Dessie Good

customer_reviews.title: Love the uggs but...
customer_reviews.text: I love my short uggs and thought a tall pair would be great for the crazy winter we are having. They fit great in the foot but I must have big calves because they were so tight. I'm returning them and maybe I'll buy a different style.
customer_reviews.author: pumpkin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of these I’ve bought for my daughter she wore the first pair out totally loves him
customer_reviews.author: Photo girl

customer_reviews.title: Comfy boots
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of UGGS! Now I see what they are all about - very comfy and easy to slip on/off. Love wearing them with leggings. I am a size 10 and bought a size 10. Fit well!
customer_reviews.author: Goldie Golds

customer_reviews.title: Love Uggs
customer_reviews.text: Love Ugg boots, however, I have several pairs and this one is slightly bigger than the others. They are so warm and cozy I just don't care if they are slightly bigger since they do not have half sizes and I absolutely do not want to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Since it is only offered in full sizes and no ...
customer_reviews.text: Since it is only offered in full sizes and no half size the area across the top of my ankle area was a little tight. I think the more I wear them it will stretch out some. I was afraid if I ordered another full size larger it would be too big.
customer_reviews.author: Avery N. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Unsure!
customer_reviews.text: I already had black tall classic uggs but wanted tan ones to utilize my wardrobe a bit more during the winter months. I like the product, however am not a fan of the vendor. I placed my order on Monday and the item did not ship until Thursday...why such a long wait? I understand that Amazon has to forward the order to the vendor but I have ordered several things over the past year that amazon did not stock directly and still had my order ship within no more than 48 hours. The boots are comfy but don't seem to be as nice as my black ones...half wondering if they are fake at this point but we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Skater101

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected, warm, great with leggings.
customer_reviews.text: I love them. I am a size 6 and I ordered the size 6. They fit perfectly. If you have bigger calves, however, they would probably be snug. This style fits snug around your calf so you could wear it under jeans. Great for wearing with tights. Warm as can be.
customer_reviews.author: Lauraji

customer_reviews.title: Always loved UGGS!
customer_reviews.text: I've worn UGGS loooong before (1980) they were a fashion statement in US...some lasting more than fifteen years with almost daily use! These are what I expected, and will keep wearing them until I'm ancient!
customer_reviews.author: Heathersmist

customer_reviews.title: Nothing beats a great Ugh boot
customer_reviews.text: Nothing beats a great Ugh boot! Been wearing them for a few years, I spray them once a year with waterproofing and they've never leaked, hold up well, and are very comfortable. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine Garsee

customer_reviews.title: UGG Boots
customer_reviews.text: Just like the other 8 pair of UGG's I have, purchased at Dillard's & Macy's. Am somewhat puzzled that the UGG tag on the back of the gray ultra-tall boots is gray and not beige like all the others. H-m-m-m.......that is why a 4-star & not 5. However, haven't purchased UGG boots since last year so many this is just a new thing (?).
customer_reviews.author: Steel Magnolia

customer_reviews.title: Warm on feet
customer_reviews.text: Lovely boots love the color you can wear these with almost anything
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my uggs!
customer_reviews.text: I took these to Europe in the winter to weather through snow and cold. They're amazing! Make sure to put the protectant on them though otherwise the snow could be rough on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY SAND UGGS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! :-)
customer_reviews.text: I love my sand UGGS!!! They are beautiful & fit wonderfully...I can't wait for the weather to get cool enough to wear them...I have many pairs of UGGS, but these look like the most gorgeous of all...The seller did a fantastic job, packaging,shipping and the pricing was wonderful!!! :-) Thank you for making these boots available!!! :-) Keep up the good work!!! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of Uggs. They're warm and comfortable with the exception that the toe area seems a little short for me. However, I'm hoping they'll stretch out as I wear them and end up a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Lee

customer_reviews.title: GREAt
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these and the best part is we picked them up on Amazon warehouse for significantly cheaper then the store or online purchases (we paid $130 for an adult size 9!). We weren't looking for a warehouse deal but stumbled across it...once I found out about amazon warehouse I have become a regular shopper there. I occasionally find some awesome deals!
customer_reviews.author: Kossie

customer_reviews.title: So awesome!! But fake?
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't stop petting the inside because they were so soft! Then my friend said they were fake? I got black ones from amazon for Christmas and the insides of those are rough. I'm so confused... But they are very comfy! Wore in the snow, but avoided puddles (had uggs before. STAY OUT OF WATER!)
customer_reviews.author: K Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, Great seller!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th pair of UGG boots and I love them all! I love the tall boot the most because of it's fit and warmth. They go with everything and last forever. Order them to size and they stretch to fit the contours of your feet. Living in Oregon, UGGS have become part of everyday life...they are awsome! I had a wonderful experience with this seller, Villa Shoes and would order from him again.
customer_reviews.author: LOVES UGGS!!!

customer_reviews.title: Ugg boots - my grandaughter says she might even sleep in them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tall Uggs for my 20 year old grandaughter. She is a student in Theater and is on her feet most of the day, singing, dancing, and acting. She wanted these because people told her how comfortable they were. After she wore them all day on Christmas, she declared she just might sleep in them. It is now nearly a month later and she still thinks they are just what she needed.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Wall McGraw

customer_reviews.title: Boots arrived on time and as expected.
customer_reviews.text: So warm and toasty for the winter months. I have them on right now!
customer_reviews.author: Linda J Weaver

customer_reviews.title: "UGG Boots: Comfortable, Attractive, & Versatile"
customer_reviews.text: Love, love UGG boots! They are comfortable & attractive, as well as versatile. I will not purchase or wear any other boot, but UGG!
customer_reviews.author: Steel Magnolia

customer_reviews.title: I love the way they feel and the warmth they provide ...
customer_reviews.text: Warning to anyone buying black uggs.....they turn your feet black. I love the way they feel and the warmth they provide but having the black dye rub off on your feet and hands is a minus.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Sent me a table display.... really?!
customer_reviews.text: The boots looked like it has been tried on by multiple people. It didn’t come with any care instructions or any paper wrappings. What came in the mail, is what you see in the picture. The boots were cheaply made and it didn’t feel authentic at all. Worst buy ever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter for Christmas and she loves them. She wears them as often as possible (though it's not usually cold enough because these are highly insulated). She loves them so much, I'm thinking about getting me a pair of UGG slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Always Reading

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Warm
customer_reviews.text: Birthday present for the wife. Her other tall one had a hole in the side and winter is fast approaching. These are her favorite warm boots.
customer_reviews.author: TKE

customer_reviews.title: My daughter got th she at Christmas. After wearing ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got th she at Christmas. After wearing them form2 weeks she developed a slit in the top. I called Uggs since they warranty their products for one year. I just got them returned and it turns out they are more than one year old. I just bought them in November!
customer_reviews.author: elena

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: COMFORTABLE!! Warm and cozy. Last Christmas present ever from my husband before he passed away. He insisted because he didnt want me to be cold! They are perfect! 😉
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Hermansen

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars to the vendor, 4 stars to UGG Australia.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was happy. The boots re authentic and they arrived when expected. So, I give 5 stars to the vendor. I am kind of displeased that these boots don't come 1/2 sizes. My daughter is 8-1/2 and I had to get a 9 for her.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia

product_meta.title: UGG Australia Toddler Classic Boot
product_meta.description:
The kids' Classic provides all the same features and benefits as its grown-up predecessor. The lightweight, flexible outsole and genuine Twinface sheepskin provide signature UGG comfort that will make this quintessential style your kids everyday favorite. 

 * Twinface sheepskin
 * 6 shaft height
 * Nylon binding
 * UGGpure insole
 * Molded EVA outsole
 * Patent-protected tread design
 * Style #1009252Y
